metadata.Title: CVE-2009-3582 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in the delete subroutine in SQL-Ledger 2.8.24 allow remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) id and possibly (2) db parameters in a Delete action to the output of a Vendors>Reports>Search search operation.

criterions.comment: sql-ledger: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
